title: Version History Entry
description: Describes a single entry in the top-level versionHistory array.

version.description: The version identifier for this entry (e.g., "1.1.0").

date.description: The date this version was created (ISO 8601 format YYYY-MM-DD).

changes.description: A description of the changes made in this version of the signalJourney file.

author.description: The person or entity who made the changes.
